It notifies Realitio contract for arbitration requests and creates corresponding dispute on Kleros. Transmits Kleros ruling to Realitio contract. Maintains crowdfunded appeals and notifies Kleros contract. Provides a function to submit evidence for Kleros dispute.  Disputes happen between the last answer and the challenger's answer. But Kleros can rule for any valid answer as a response.  There is a conversion between Kleros ruling and Realitio answer and there is a need for shifting by 1. devdoc.details: A proxy contract for Realitio with extra logic to form an adapter between Kleros and Realitio. It notifies Realitio contract for arbitration requests and creates corresponding dispute on Kleros. Transmits Kleros ruling to Realitio contract. Maintains crowdfunded appeals and notifies Kleros contract. Provides a function to submit evidence for Kleros dispute.  Disputes happen between the last answer and the challenger's answer. But Kleros can rule for any valid answer as a response.  There is a conversion between Kleros ruling and Realitio answer and there is a need for shifting by 1. For reviewers this should be a focus as it's quite easy to get confused. Any mistakes on this conversion will render this contract useless.  NOTE: This contract trusts to the Kleros arbitrator and Realitio.

DisputeIDToQuestionID(uint256,bytes32).details: Emitted when arbitration is requested, to link dispute ID to question ID for dynamic script. Used in dynamic script in metaevidence.

params._disputeID: The ID of the dispute in the ERC792 arbitrator.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

changeLoserAppealPeriodMultiplier(uint25.details: Changes the multiplier for calculating the duration of the appeal period for loser.

params._loserAppealPeriodMultiplier: The new loser multiplier for the appeal period, in basis points.

params._loserMultiplier: The new loser multiplier value in basis points.

changeMetaEvidence(string).details: Updates the meta evidence used for disputes.

params._metaEvidence: URI to the new meta evidence file.

params._winnerMultiplier: The new winner multiplier value in basis points.

params._arbitrator: The address of the ERC792 arbitrator.
params._arbitratorExtraData: The extra data used to raise a dispute in the ERC792 arbitrator.
params._realitio: The address of the Realitio contract.

fundAppeal(uint256,uint256).details: TRUSTED. Manages contributions and calls appeal function of the specified arbitrator to appeal a dispute. This function lets appeals be crowdfunded. Note that we dont need to check that msg.value is enough to pay arbitration fees as its the responsibility of the arbitrator contract.

params._ruling: The ruling option to which the caller wants to contribute to.

returns.fullyFunded: True if the ruling option got fully funded as a result of this contribution.

getDisputeFee(bytes32).details: Returns arbitration fee by asking to arbitrator.

params._questionID: The question id as in Realitio side.

returns._loserAppealPeriodMultiplier: Losers appeal period multiplier. The loser is given less time to fund its appeal to defend against last minute appeal funding attacks.

getTotalWithdrawableAmount(uint256,addre.details: Returns the sum of withdrawable amount.

params._contributedTo: Ruling options to look for potential withdrawals.
params._contributor: The contributor for which to query.

returns.sum: The total amount available to withdraw.

numberOfRulingOptions(uint256).details: Returns number of possible ruling options. Valid rulings are [0, return value].

reportAnswer(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,add.details: Reports the answer to a specified question from the Kleros arbitrator to the Realitio contract.

params._lastAnswerOrCommitmentID: The last answer given, or its commitment ID if it was a commitment, to the question in the Realitio contract, in bytes32.
params._lastAnswerer: The last answerer to the question in the Realitio contract.
params._lastHistoryHash: The history hash given with the last answer to the question in the Realitio contract.

requestArbitration(bytes32,uint256).details: Sets the meta evidence. Can only be called once.

params._maxPrevious: If specified, reverts if a bond higher than this was submitted after you sent your transaction.
params._questionID: The question id as in Realitio side.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Receives ruling from Kleros and executes consequences.

params._ruling: Ruling that is given by Kleros. This needs to be converted to Realitio answer by shifting by 1.

submitEvidence(uint256,string).details: Allows to submit evidence for a given dispute.

withdrawFeesAndRewards(uint256,address,u.details: Allows to withdraw any reimbursable fees or rewards after the dispute gets solved.

params._contributor: The address to withdraw its rewards.
params._roundNumber: The number of the round caller wants to withdraw from.
params._ruling: A ruling option that the caller wants to withdraw fees and rewards related to it.

withdrawFeesAndRewardsForAllRounds(uint2.details: Allows to withdraw any rewards or reimbursable fees after the dispute gets resolved. For multiple rulings options and for all rounds at once.

params._contributedTo: Rulings that received contributions from contributor.
params._contributor: The address to withdraw its rewards.

withdrawFeesAndRewardsForMultipleRulings.details: Allows to withdraw any reimbursable fees or rewards after the dispute gets solved. For multiple ruling options at once.

params._contributedTo: Rulings that received contributions from contributor.
params._contributor: The address to withdraw its rewards.
params._roundNumber: The number of the round caller wants to withdraw from.

externalIDtoLocalID.details: Maps external (arbitrator side) dispute id to local (arbitrable) dispute id. This is necessary to obtain local dispute data by arbitrators id.

params._externalDisputeID: Dispute id as in arbitrator side.

externalIDtoLocalID.return: localDisputeID Dispute id as in arbitrable contract.

devdoc.title: RealitioArbitratorWithAppeals

changeGovernor(address).notice: Changes the address of the governor.

changeLoserMultiplier(uint64).notice: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the losing party.

changeWinnerMultiplier(uint64).notice: Changes the proportion of appeal fees that must be added to appeal cost for the winning party.
